alert.note: Alert for Beltrami; Hubbard (Minnesota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Eastern ND and Grand Forks (Northeastern North Dakota and Northwestern Minnesota)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued July 09 at 8:15PM CDT until July 09 at 9:00PM CDT by NWS Eastern ND and Grand Forks
info.description: The National Weather Service in Grand Forks has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Northern Hubbard County in north central Minnesota... South central Beltrami County in north central Minnesota... * Until 900 PM CDT. * At 814 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Becida, or 10 miles southwest of Bemidji, moving southeast at 45 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and half dollar size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Plantagenet Lake, Laporte, Kabekona, Benedict, Guthrie, Becida and Nary. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.25 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
